Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 2 (Trp- and Arg-rich; derivative of Tritrpticin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Klebsiella pneumonia, Proteus mirabilis;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus epidermidis, Streptococcus group D.Fungi:Aspergillus fumigatus.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of a 13 amino acid tryptophan-rich peptide derived from a putative porcine precursor protein of a novel family of antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Lawyer C, Pai S, Watabe M, Borgia P, Mashimo T, Eagleton L, Watabe K.
